'''Caution in Confidence''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Admonishing Instruction" [[Alhaitham]] ({{Dendro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

{{Wish History Table|Caution in Confidence}}

==Trivia==
